transcript: if you've seen Last Dance Michael Jordan there's this moment where he says that he always has to bring his all because there's some person who spent hard-earned money and it's the only game they're ever going to see and he wants to bring his best for that that's how I see it I spend so much time on those books and presentations that I make when I give speeches and stuff like every presentation I make has been custom and that takes me like three days they spent real money to be there and it was like they're hoping that they can get one thing from this thing that's gonna like change their life and I want to honor that
